name: SurahYaseen
0:
”Alexa, open surah ya seen”
”Alexa, ask surah ya seen for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start surah ya seen”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: surah ya seen
des:
This is the complete recitation of Sura Ya-Sin.

Say Alexa Open "Surah Ya Seen" to start the recitation. 

This telawat is by the famous Quraan reciter Mishary bin Rashid Alafasy in Arabic.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
